node.html: The following code is a script developed for the Spaceship Titanic competition, it proposes a scenario where the spaceship collides with a space anomaly. The challenge is to predict, based on a given dataset, which passengers were transported.

During the course Databases and SQL for Data Science at IBM, I developed a project covering the exploratory analysis of nutritional data from the popular McDonalds menu. We focused on identifying the McDonald's menu item with the highest sodium content.

The code developed for this project aims to process and analyze satellite images to detect and segment solar panels. It uses advanced image processing and machine learning techniques to accurately identify areas containing solar panels.

frontmatter.title: Back-End Engineering Project for Logistics System

node.html: Refactored code from a Back-End Engineering project to develop a component that will be used by the new Lyft rental fleet logistics system.
In the study carried out, three different sets of data from Chicago were used, made available on the city of Chicago data portal, for an in-depth analysis of socioeconomic and public safety issues.

frontmatter.title: Analysis of Temperatures in Cities Around the World

node.html: In this study, we used MLlib, an Apache Spark machine learning library, to analyze temperatures in a group of cities around the world.
Java application that converts between multiple currencies. This converter uses an API to get real-time quotes and features a user interface powered by JavaFX.
The application for equipment inventory management. Developed with a friendly graphical interface, making it easy to add, edit, view and delete equipment information in an integrated database.

frontmatter.title: VoiceFit: Health and Nutrition Assistant with Voice Control

node.html: Interactive health tool that allows users to calculate their BMI in an easy and accessible way using voice commands. Based on calculated BMI, the app provides general health recommendations and helps locate nutrition professionals, making it a useful tool for initial health and wellness guidance.
